mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT M.EMP_CODE, M.PROJECT_ID, M.WT_TYPE, M.WBS_CODE, M.WBS_NAME, M.PROJECT_ROLE, M.PROJECT_LEADER FROM ( UNION ALL ) M GROUP BY M.EMP_CODE, M.PROJECT_ID, M.WT_TYPE, M.WBS_CODE, M.WBS_NAME, M.PROJECT_ROLE, M.PROJECT_LEADER
SELECT M.EMP_CODE, SUM(M.WORKING_HOUR) WORKING_HOUR FROM ( UNION ALL ) M GROUP BY M.EMP_CODE
SELECT M.EMP_CODE, M.PROJECT_ID, SUM(M.WORKING_HOUR) WORKING_HOUR FROM ( UNION ALL ) M GROUP BY M.EMP_CODE, M.PROJECT_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BG_INTERFACE_BSP (wt_year, wt_season, emp_code, wt_type, project_id, wbs_code, wbs_name, total_input_time, input_time, input_percentage, project_leader, project_role, update_time) VALUES (#{WT_YEAR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{WT_SEASON,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EMP_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{WT_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PROJECT_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{WBS_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{WBS_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TOTAL_INPUT_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{INPUT_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{INPUT_PERCENTAGE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PROJECT_LEADER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PROJECT_ROLE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{update_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') )

INSERT INTO BG_INTERFACE_BSP_DETAIL (business_id, work_time, hr_code, category, project_id, wbs_number, projcet_name, working_hour, approver, project_role, update_time) SELECT M.ID, M.WORK_TIME, M.EMP_CODE, M.CATEGORY, M.PROJECT_ID, M.WBS_CODE, M.PROJECT_NAME, M.WORKING_HOUR, M.APPROVER, M.ROLE, to_date(#{update_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') FROM ( UNION ALL ) M WHERE M.ID IS NOT NULL
mapper.select: SELECT PU.ID, PU.HRCODE, PU.PROJECT_ID, PU.PROJECT_ID, PU.START_DATE, PU.END_DATE, U1.HRCODE PROJECT_LEADER, U1.USERALIAS LEADER_USERNAME FROM BG_PROJECT_USER PU LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER U1 ON U1.HRCODE = PU.HRCODE WHERE PU.ROLE = '1' AND STATUS='1' AND PU.PROJECT_ID= #{projectId} AND to_char(PU.START_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= #{monthEndDay} AND to_char(PU.END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') >=#{monthEndDay}
